definition: education for everyone, irrespective of background
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
No Child Left Behind Act, USA 2001

sentences.english: We accommodate differences of students, adapt our work to meet individual needs and group differences.
sentences.chinese: 我們堅信有教無類，以配合學生個體需要和羣體差異。

sentences.english: I am not like Confucius who would teach any level regardless. I am sorry.
sentences.chinese: 像是我理應像孔子一樣，有教無類，來者就教。

sentences.english: Confucius stressed that "education without discrimination", "There are differences in harmony gentleman".
sentences.chinese: 孔子強調“有教無類”，提出“君子和而不同”。
